title: 为什么挂雷神加速器hypixel会The authentication servers are currently down for ...
author: cossinings
txt_content:
为什么挂雷神加速器hypixel就会出现The authentication servers are currently down,而裸连就不会
这是我电脑的问题还是加速器的问题?

replies.author: wjwrh
replies.txt_content:
The authentication servers are currently down这个提示好像是连接不到正版验证服务器吧
关了加速器就能连的话多半是网络问题..?
减速器石锤..?

replies.author: cossinings
replies.txt_content: 忘记说了，挂雷神加速器就会出现The authentication servers are currently down for maintenance忘记打for maintenance了

replies.author: cossinings
replies.txt_content:
wjwrh 发表于 2020-7-14 16:55
The authentication servers are currently down这个提示好像是连接不到正版验证服务器吧
关了加速器就能连 ...
不知道，裸连就能连上（但是真的卡）,加了加速器就连不上就The authentication servers are currently down for maintenance了

replies.author: wjwrh
replies.txt_content:
cossinings 发表于 2020-7-14 16:56
忘记说了，挂雷神加速器就会出现The authentication servers are currently down for maintenance忘记打for ...
有没有后面那个都一个意思

“身份验证服务器正在维护，暂时不可用”
多半是网络问题
